Description: API Ninjas provides 1 API endpoint for 16 data APIs divided into three tiers. Tier 1 offers fundamental building block data for cities, currency conversion, country stats, dictionary, exchange rates, geocoding, reverse geocoding, facts, jokes, and trivia. Tier 2 offers data for thousands of cars from dozens of automakers, celebrity data, and text &extraction from images. Tier 3 offers data about Air Quality (AQI), nutrition extraction via natural language processing alogrithms, and weather for regions around the world.
